name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Operations Engineer with 13+ years of experience and a robust skill set in **Linux**, **Networking**, **Data Center** management, and **GPU** utilization. Proficient in **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, and capable of using **Grafana** and **Prometheus** for monitoring applications and infrastructure performance. Expert in **Python**, **Bash**, and **PowerShell** scripting for automation and troubleshooting, ensuring optimal operational efficiency.
Adept at creating comprehensive documentation and facilitating effective collaboration across teams. Demonstrated flexibility and problem-solving capabilities in dynamic environments. Proven record of delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in AI/ML platforms, cloud-native systems deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**, and microservices architecture.
